column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Richard - Thanks for your review and feedback. We're always happy to offer customers a different dish if they are severely underwhelmed. And as we prepare upwards of 1
column3: there will be a certain percentage that don't come out flawlessly. And by the nature of eggs themselves
column4: there's no way to determine yolk consistency without breaking them open. Again
column5: we're always happy to replace eggs if customers are not 100% satisfied. Thank you again.
